languages.text: Губернатор Мэйв правила недолго, но ярко. Не в силах отказать простым людям, страдающим от притеснений знати, она бросила все свои силы на заботу о нуждающихся, чем вызвала гнев дворянства. Против госпожи губернатора были сфабрикованы обвинения в колдовстве, и не искушенная в интригах Мейв попала в расставленные сети. Фесмофориус заключил девушку в свои объятия, и в память о ней осталось лишь пара грустных песен, которые украдкой пели немногие из благодарных простолюдинов.

Maive's rule as governor of Thassera was as short as it was memorable. Incapable of turning down any common folk suffering under the nobility's oppression, she focused her every effort on helping those in need, thus incurring the aristocracy's wrath. False accusations of sorcery were concocted against the governor, and, being uninitiated in the art of plotting and scheming, Maive walked right into the trap. The Phesmophorius took the young woman in its embrace, and all that remained of her memory was a handful of mournful songs, hummed in secret by a few grateful commoners.

traits.locale_text: Governor Maive's time in office was as short as it was memorable. Incapable of turning down common folk who were suffering under the nobility's oppression, she focused her every effort on helping those in need, thus incurring the aristocracy's wrath. False accusations of sorcery were concocted against the governor. Uninitiated in the art of plotting and scheming, Maive walked into the trap. The Phesmophorius took the young woman in its embrace, and all that remained of her memory was a handful of sad songs that a few grateful commoners sang in secret.

languages.text: Maives Herrschaft als Gouverneurin von Thassera war ebenso kurz wie bemerkenswert. Sie war nicht in der Lage, das Leid des gemeinen Volks wegen der Unterdrückung durch den Adel zu lindern, und konzentrierte all ihre Bemühungen darauf, allen in Not zu helfen, was ihr den Zorn der Aristokratie einbrachte. Falsche Anschuldigungen der Zauberei wurden gegen die Gouverneurin erhoben, und da Maive in der Kunst der Komplotte und Intrigen unerfahren war, ging sie direkt in die Falle. Der Phesmophorius umschlang die junge Frau, und die einzige Erinnerung an sie war eine Handvoll trauriger Lieder, die insgeheim von wenigen dankbaren einfachen Bürgern gesungen wurden.

Der Phesmophorius umschlang die junge Frau, und die einzige Erinnerung an sie war eine Handvoll trauriger Lieder, die insgeheim von wenigen dankbaren einfachen Bürgern gesungen wurden.

languages.text: Le règne de Maive sur Thassera fut de courte durée, bien que mémorable. Incapable d'ignorer ceux qui souffraient de l'oppression de la noblesse, elle s'efforça d'aider tous ceux qui étaient dans le besoin, s'attirant par là même les foudres de l'aristocratie. Très vite, Maive se vit faussement accusée de sorcellerie, et, ignorante qu'elle était de l'art du complot et de la machination, elle tomba dans le piège la tête la première. Le Phesmophorius s'empressa de s'emparer de la jeune femme. Seule une poignée de chants funèbres, fredonnés en secret par quelques roturiers reconnaissants, perpétuent sa mémoire.
languages.original_text: Maive's rule as governor of Thassera was as short as it was memorable. Incapable of turning down any common folk suffering under the nobility's oppression, she focused her every effort on helping those in need, thus incurring the aristocracy's wrath. False accusations of sorcery were concocted against the governor, and, being uninitiated in the art of plotting and scheming, Maive walked right into the trap. The Phesmophorius took the young woman in its embrace, and all that remained of her memory was a handful of mournful songs, hummed in secret by a few grateful commoners.

languages.text: 尽管梅芙总督在塔瑟拉的任期很短暂，但却给所有人留下了深刻的印象。她从不拒绝任何受到贵族压迫的平民百姓，竭尽全力帮助那些需要帮助的人，而她的行为也激起了贵族的怒火。有人捏造了梅芙使用巫术的不实指控，而梅芙对阴谋诡计一无所知，毫无戒心地落入了陷阱。当菲斯摩弗瑞斯将这个年轻女人拥入炽热的怀抱中时，关于这位总督的所有记忆，便只剩下了几首悲伤的歌谣，由一群心怀感激的平民私下传唱。
languages.original_text: Maive's rule as governor of Thassera was as short as it was memorable. False accusations of sorcery were concocted against the governor, and, being uninitiated in the art of plotting and scheming, Maive walked right into the trap. The Phesmophorius took the young woman in its embrace, and all that remained of her memory was a handful of mournful songs, hummed in secret by a few grateful commoners.

尽管梅芙总督任期短暂，但却给所有人留下了深刻的印象。她从不拒绝任何受到贵族压迫的平民百姓，竭尽全力帮助那些需要帮助的人，而她的行为也激起了贵族的怒火。有人捏造了梅芙使用巫术的不实指控，而梅芙对阴谋诡计一无所知，毫无戒心地落入了陷阱。当菲斯摩弗瑞斯将这个年轻女人拥入炽热的怀抱中时，关于这位总督的所有记忆，便只剩下了几首悲伤的歌谣，由一群心怀感激的平民私下传唱。

languages.text: El gobierno de Maive en Thassera fue tan breve como memorable. Incapaz de ignorar el sufrimiento del pueblo llano bajo la opresión de la nobleza, dedicó todos sus esfuerzos a ayudar a los necesitados, despertando así la furia de los aristócratas. Se lanzaron acusaciones falsas de hechicería contra la gobernadora y, dada su inexperiencia en el arte de la conspiración, Maive cayó en su trampa. El Fesmoforio se llevó a la joven y lo único que quedó de su recuerdo fueron unas canciones pesarosas, canturreadas en secreto por plebeyos agradecidos.
languages.original_text: Maive's rule as governor of Thassera was as short as it was memorable. Incapable of turning down any common folk suffering under the nobility's oppression, she focused her every effort on helping those in need, thus incurring the aristocracy's wrath. False accusations of sorcery were concocted against the governor, and, being uninitiated in the art of plotting and scheming, Maive walked right into the trap. The Phesmophorius took the young woman in its embrace, and all that remained of her memory was a handful of mournful songs, hummed in secret by a few grateful commoners.

El Fesmoforio se llevó a la joven y lo único que quedó de su recuerdo fueron unas canciones pesarosas, canturreadas en secreto por plebeyos agradecidos.

languages.text: メイヴがタッセーラの総督として治めた期間は短くも記憶に残るものだった。貴族の圧政に苦しむ庶民の声を聞き入れずにはいられなかった彼女は、困窮する者たちを助けることに全力を注ぎ、その結果、貴族階級の怒りを買った。総督に対して魔術の濡れ衣をでっち上げられ、策略や陰謀の術に不慣れだったメイヴは、まんまと罠に嵌ってしまった。フェスモフォリウスは若き女性をその抱擁に包み込んだ。彼女の記憶に残ったのは、感謝するわずかな庶民がひそかに口ずさむ哀歌の数々だけだった。
languages.original_text: Maive's rule as governor of Thassera was as short as it was memorable. Incapable of turning down any common folk suffering under the nobility's oppression, she focused her every effort on helping those in need, thus incurring the aristocracy's wrath. False accusations of sorcery were concocted against the governor, and, being uninitiated in the art of plotting and scheming, Maive walked right into the trap. The Phesmophorius took the young woman in its embrace, and all that remained of her memory was a handful of mournful songs, hummed in secret by a few grateful commoners.

languages.text: Maive'in Thassera valiliği kısa sürse de unutulmazdı. Soyluların zulmü altında ezilen hiçbir sıradan vatandaşı görmezden gelemeyen Maive, tüm gayretiyle ihtiyaç sahiplerine yardım etmeye odaklandı. Böylece aristokrasinin gazabını üzerine çekti. Vali aleyhine yalan büyücülük suçlamaları uyduruldu ve dalavere sanatına yabancı olan Maive, dosdoğru tuzağın içine düştü. Pesmoforyus, genç kadını kucakladı ve halktan bir avuç minnettar insanın mırıldandığı birkaç yaslı şarkıdan başka hiçbir hatırası kalmadı.
languages.original_text: Maive's rule as governor of Thassera was as short as it was memorable. Incapable of turning down any common folk suffering under the nobility's oppression, she focused her every effort on helping those in need, thus incurring the aristocracy's wrath. False accusations of sorcery were concocted against the governor, and, being uninitiated in the art of plotting and scheming, Maive walked right into the trap. The Phesmophorius took the young woman in its embrace, and all that remained of her memory was a handful of mournful songs, hummed in secret by a few grateful commoners.
